programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Antons little toasty body disintegrates during a swim class. When Gumball and Darwin see Anton the next day, as good as new, they set out to discover his secret. It turns out that his parents use a special formula to bake new Antons when necessary. So the kids test it out at home and end up baking a clone army whose leader - Ant-one - wants to destroy Anton and take over the world.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After begging Dad for a puppy, the kids are taken aback when he comes home with a turtle. Despite the fact that the turtle turns out to be extremely aggressive (especially toward Gumball) they try their best to give it the love it deserves. This achieves nothing. The Evil Turtle escapes and goes on a rampage, and they have to find it before it destroys Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mom reveals that Gumballs real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. His family try to make him remember the old Gumball, as this new Zach persona is progressively taking over Gumballs life and erasing his memories. If they cant reach him in time, the old Gumball will disappear forever and theyll be left with Zach!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. An array of diverse characters you may have noticed lurking in the background of Gumball and Darwins adventures finally let their voices be heard. A series of sketches include some tennis crowd extras, two pizzas in love and The Bacon Guy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything. Their constant moaning grabs the attention of the good people of Elmore. Mistaking Gumball and Darwin for genuine kids in need, they put on a benefit and raise money for them. How do Gumball and Darwin confess theres been a mix-up without inciting a riot?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When the Wattersons arrive at the mall for a day of shopping, they struggle to find a space in the parking lot. They search for a space everywhere - using all their intelligence, cunning and trickery - but as the day goes on, the desperate hunt for a space becomes more important than the trip to the mall itself.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake, Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. He offers them all sorts of "incentives" to keep quiet but the truth is they really dont care whether the diploma is real or not. Mistaking their disinterest as "playing hard to get" Principal Brown resorts to increasingly desperate measures to ensure Gumball and Darin play ball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. When Gumball objects he is told that even the smallest misdemeanour can lead to a breakdown in law. In an effort to impress the kids Donut Cop takes them for a ride-along in his cop car and gets carried away, progressively breaking the law himself. He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin follow Nicole to the Rainbow Factory for Bring your Kids to Work Day. They are expecting a magical place full of dreams and wonder but it turns out to be a little less magical than theyd hoped. Despite the fact nobody wants them there, they end up saving the factory from being closed down.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Darwin tries to highlight the plight of all the household objects he feels are being oppressed and maltreated by the uncaring residents of Elmore. He then decides to lead those objects in a revolt against the townspeople.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: The boys stay up all night, even though the next day theyre supposed to be babysitting Polly - Pennys little sister. Theyre so tired that they manage to lose Polly in the blink of an eye. They desperately look for her, but find themselves in increasingly weird situations every time they accidently nod off.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard, as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories, it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumballs old BFF, Fuzzy, turns up on his doorstep. Darwin struggles to accept that there was someone before him and fails to contain his jealousy. But is Darwin right to mistrust Fuzzy? Does Fuzzy actually have sinister motives for reconnecting with his old BFF?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins clothes go missing after a swimming lesson, and Gumball is forced to wear a tuxedo from the lost and found office. He believes it makes him look like a certain dapper British secret agent and, together with Darwin and Bobert (and far too many wisecracks) Gumball tracks down the villain responsible for stealing his clothes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball Single Story
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin help Anais rescue her doll from Tina Rex. / Gumball and Darwin are unwitting accomplices in a gas station robbery. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally destroy Mr Robinsons new car… or do they? / Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some "quality time". / Gumballs magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart! / Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss just happened to capture Lamput last night, so this morning hes on top of the world!! But disaster strikes; during his morning ablutions, the Boss makes a fatal slip of the clippers, and his glorious Tache goes tumbling to the bathroom tiles. Its a catastrophic turn of events for the poor old coot... turns out hes got a raft of deep-seated family issues wrapped up in that white crest of lip-fur. Kindly Lamput takes pity on the poor emasculated Bossman, and helps him sneak back into the lab and get his hands on the tache-restorative formula. It all goes well. Well... well ish. Boss is happy - he gets his glorious mo back. The catch is, literally everyone else does too. You dont really understand someone until youve walked a mile in their tache.

programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

But when Slippy brings him back to the Clubhouse, they soon realise Victor needs to be in his home.

But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. Its time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyones guess. Meanwhile Lamputs facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.sub-title: De Zaak van het Vermiste Kussen
programme.desc: Unable to sleep because of the incessant barking from a dog somewhere in the city, Tom and Jerry must track down the noisy mutt. When they find the dog with the help of a friendly bat, they discover the pup cant sleep without her special pillow. Now, for the sake of everyones sleep, the great pillow case is on!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Rick and Ginger install a high-tech, state-of-the-art home security system, Tom and Jerrys shenanigans activate the homes automation system. Using the system against each other, they quickly lose control and the house shuts them down.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm thatll soften and beautify her gnarly-looking feet. She has Tom rub it in, nice and good. Unfortunately, the foot balm is a little too strong and makes her foot disappear. Hildies recipe may be a foot balm bomb but it gives Tom a good idea. Hell use it to "vanish" into thin air. Jerry literally doesnt know what hit him when the invisible cat bats him around like a ball of yarn. Tom is unaware when the effects begin to wear off and Jerry is able to defend himself. When Jerry gets a hold of the cream, its his turn to have the upper hand. A battle of the vanishing cream ensues, each using it in various ways to outwit the other.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tykes got a problem and it all began when the pup stepped on a wood plank. The same wood plank Tom discarded after using it as a hockey stick to slap Jerry (the puck) into the goal (the doghouse). Now Tykes got a painful splinter in his paw and since Tom was charged with watching him while a sickly Spike naps, Toms tasked with trying to remove the splinter before Spike wakes. Tom makes a few painful (for them both) attempts to remove the sliver with no success. Hearing Tykes whimpers, a sympathetic Jerry decides to help Tom out. In the end, Tom and Jerry get the splinter out but not before inflicting equal doses of pain while trying a myriad of home remedies from a hot bath, to tweezers, to adhesive tape, to glue, and more!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isnt invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party - even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Beans trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and hes not a happy bunny.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny "crashes" Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs cant keep up with Lamput and he manages to escape them at every move. Inspired by the animals at a local zoo, the Docs build a machine to harness the animal prowess. Maybe now they can be as fast as a cheetah and outrun Lamput!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Queen Beatrice hires the Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive, but there is one rule of hers that the crew have trouble following.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry Gokko
programme.desc: Tom is taking selfies and enjoying a sweet snack at the candy shop, when Jerry and Tuffy sneak up and eat his strawberries. Tom proceeds to chase after them, but Tuffy falls into the claw machine. Jerry tries to save him, and Tom fishes them out. Tom makes Tuffy cry and apologizes by feeding him sweets.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Clayface, Gotham Citys messiest villain, arrives to cause trouble during Gothams annual Clean Up Day. Redbird must overcome his fear of taking baths if hes going to help Bam bring Clayface to justice.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Kryptos path, hes determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Spike gets a cold and hes separated from his son, Tyke. Spike tells Tom to take care of him, or else.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into helping an evil magician capture all of the mice in the village but Jerry Van Mouseling foils the magicians plans. / Tom forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue. / The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster. / Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs. / Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog. / Fed up Tom decides to go home to his birth family. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whos laid back attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry battles Tom to save a crab from becoming the Duke and Duchess main course.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Fed up Tom decides to go home to his birth family.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. Its really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, lets face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast testing every app on the rangers tablet one by one. Grizzy, who is starving, sees that the cupboards are bare. When he realizes that one GPS app can give the itinerary to the nearest chocolate spread store, Grizzy requisitions the tablet.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side, there is the same cabin, only it doesnt belong to a ranger. Its a chocolate spread museum, where the curators are... another Grizzy and other Lemmings, all with very different personalities.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature form. / Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a strange gateway to a parallel world. On the other side there is the same cabin only it doesnt belong to a ranger. / Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids and Skatestar must stop Rolloxtreme to protect the location Enigmas secret base.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom finds himself in a series of unfortunate events. / Hi-jinx ensue when Jerry decides to mock-up a "REWARD IF FOUND" poster with Toms picture on it and listing the address of the neighbour with the ferocious dog as Toms home... / Tom and Jerry must work together to prove Bog is overkill. / Jerry Tom and Spike need rescuing on their snowy vacation. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Its Spikes birthday, but Rick has forgotten about it. Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember, but unfortunately their every effort backfires. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Toodles folks are coming for a visit. Problem is they think shes married with kittens. Tom plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their kittens. / Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help him remove a bad tooth so he can avoid the vet. / Tom finds himself in a series of unfortunate events. / Hi-jinx ensue when Jerry decides to mock-up a "REWARD IF FOUND" poster with Toms picture on it and listing the address of the neighbour with the ferocious dog as Toms home... / Tom and Jerry must work together to prove Bog is overkill. / Jerry Tom and Spike need rescuing on their snowy vacation. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Huldie sends Tom and Jerry into the woods to find a baby dragon who they befriend on the way home. When Hildie tells them she plans on making a special baby dragon dinner Tom and Jerry work together to save him.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its Spikes birthday! Hes been counting down the days. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special but not this one. He has forgotten. Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires, making the pathetic pooch sorry he was ever born. This one ends happily, we promise.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A mockingbird has taken roost in a tree outside Gingers window, where it sings the sweetest songs whenever shes around. When she leaves for work, however, the mockingbird earns its name by mocking Tom and Jerry relentlessly. When her nest full of eggs hatches and the insults really take flight, Tom, Jerry and even Spike, decide its time for these birds to fly the coop!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby hes got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working - until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean tries to get some muscles but attempts a shortcut to physical perfection. / Mr Bean has a new friend - a Seagull but sometimes friends can overstay their welcome. / Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. / Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is brutally awakened by four Lemmings who are giving a grand percussion concert near the cabin, while the rest of the group dances to the rhythm. The grumpy bear puts an end to the festivities by propelling the Lemmings into the distance. When they land, they discover a magical djembe inside the trunk of a baobab tree. When the percussionists start playing again, the Lemmings and all the other wild animals are possessed by the demon of dance!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt! Dragged out of his slumber and swept away upon a vehicle, Grizzy finishes the race in a daze. Not far away, the Lemmings find a mask that can control dreams. Once Grizzy gathers his wits, he wants only to get hold of the object and return to the she-bear of his dreams. But the Lemmings have other dreams, like high-powered racing cars.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun! When a cloud passes overhead, Grizzy realizes that their respective gadgets run on electricity provided by solar panels. No more sun, no more electricity! He devises a plan whereby he will be the only one to access the energy, but the Lemmings have not said their last word!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk. Indeed, when placed inside, the trunk can blend two objects into one! The Lemmings are quicker and get their hands on the trunk, then set out to play with objects they have enhanced. But its Grizzy who discovers the formula that makes you ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels zoom into action when the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around when Green Arrow and his Arrowplane Goldie come to help Batman take on Riddler.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the towns volunteer firefighters to build a fire truck.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of Bugs Bunny and his friends in this Halloween special episode.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: After a hot cocoa disaster, Santa Claus hires The Looney Builders to build him a new toyshop in time to save Christmas.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom in his pursuit of a mouse named Jerry and the rivalry between the two characters. When Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home, everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues, and the only thing that will end it is the news that the kitten has a new home...

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry

But when the Suck-Up takes over the house Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it. / The storm of the century is brewing - at least according to Tuffy and Jerry who are giving a little pay back to Tom for tormenting them earlier. / Its picture day for Spike and Tom but they both end up dirty and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella has her best idea yet for a fun day. They will visit a nebula for each member of the family! Up first is Bernard 68, but it is very dark and frightens Tilly. When Dads truck breaks down, they head to the Boomerang nebula.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is practicing to play Saturn Dance with Priya when she calls to tell them she is sick.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Slippy, Madhu and Ella head out to see a SuperNova, they arrive too late because of Slippys endless preparations. The gang quickly decide to go zip-lining on Ganymede instead.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are practicing Pluto Jump Ride when Tilly begs to go too. Ella tells her its too dangerous and gives her a practice jump stick before she leaves. Madhu arrives to play and finds Tilly alone.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella, Slippy and Madhu are spiral space diving when Ella explains what inspired the idea.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Heron struggles to deliver her cake package to Badger in deep fog and soon finds herself surrounded by ravenous weasels.Can Toad and his friends rescue her in time?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Adder convinces Toad that her marvellous mud has rejuvenating qualities so that she can be on the front cover of Riverbank Heroes magazine.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad, Ratty, Mole and Hedge help Portly to find some bees to draw but Toads hiccups ensure they cant get close enough for drawing or honey.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Chief is persuaded to take a day off and puts Tinker in charge of getting into Toad Hall. But Tinker has bigger plans than that!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Hedge, Ratty, Mole and Toad go on a boat journey upriver to find the mysterious Song Stone.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella has her best idea yet for a fun day. They will visit a nebula for each member of the family! Up first is Bernard 68, but it is very dark and frightens Tilly. When Dads truck breaks down, they head to the Boomerang nebula.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is practicing to play Saturn Dance with Priya when she calls to tell them she is sick.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Slippy, Madhu and Ella head out to see a SuperNova, they arrive too late because of Slippys endless preparations. The gang quickly decide to go zip-lining on Ganymede instead.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are practicing Pluto Jump Ride when Tilly begs to go too. Ella tells her its too dangerous and gives her a practice jump stick before she leaves. Madhu arrives to play and finds Tilly alone.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella, Slippy and Madhu are spiral space diving when Ella explains what inspired the idea.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: One cats delicacy is another mouses poison. Tom and Jerry get caught in a thorny issue over the aroma of durian. Will the King of Fruits help reconcile their differences?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Toad, Ratty, Mole and Hedge help Portly to find some bees to draw but Toads hiccups ensure they cant get close enough for drawing or honey.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Chief is persuaded to take a day off and puts Tinker in charge of getting into Toad Hall. But Tinker has bigger plans than that!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Hedge, Ratty, Mole and Toad go on a boat journey upriver to find the mysterious Song Stone.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty boasts that he could take The Rats Nest out on a big adventure into the wide ocean.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its spring and Mole is whitewashing his burrow. His friends come to help while the watching weasels spy an opportunity to play a prank on them.

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. He watches the Lemmings vain attempts to open the safe with amusement, until he realizes that the string around his neck with the key is far from indestructible.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids and Smellvelous must face a toxic cloud released by Stinkator, which turns the SuperThings into zombies at his mercy.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Zaida Gator hires The Looney Builders to build her a boat so she can share her beignets in the swamp. She soon realizes there are others to share with elsewhere and enlists the crew to make it possible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg. -F

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Batcomputer shuts down for a system update, the other Batwheels must take over for her while aiding Batman in a battle against Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, the robot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A mockingbird has taken roost in a tree outside Gingers window, where it sings the sweetest songs whenever shes around. When she leaves for work, however, the mockingbird earns its name by mocking Tom and Jerry relentlessly. When her nest full of eggs hatches and the insults really take flight, Tom, Jerry and even Spike, decide its time for these birds to fly the coop!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When the Witch Sisters are brewing up their latest concoction, they discover that their stash of walnuts has disappeared. Needless to say, Jerry is enjoying the "nuts" of his labor, while Tom is sent out to gather more nuts. When Tom steals the winters supply of nuts from a feisty flying squirrel, things go from bad to worse. Not only does the squirrel take Jerrys stash, but the irate rodent launches an attack on Tom inside the house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen - only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese - including waking up Tom!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch and Meathead dont want to miss a marathon of their favourite show so they make a deal with Tom to trade a little TV time for a treasure map. Of course, Tom and Jerry dont know the map is a fake. Butch and Meathead try to get comfortable while Tom and Jerry must figure out how to circumvent Spike when they realise his house is directly on top of their riches.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, with all the strange, bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its a sleepover! Lil Quacker is going to spend the night over at Jerrys place. Jerrys working double time to keep the fearless duck safe from Tom. When Tyke wants Jerry and Lil Quacker to sleepover in the doghouse, Spike relents. A grateful Jerry drifts off to dreamland but not so fast when the sleepwalking duck goes on a nighttime adventure, Jerry and the gang have to save Lil Quacker from all the nocturnal dangers!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The premiere event on the fashion calendar is about to begin!! The Docs chase Lamput in through the stage door and bring the tone way down. Before you know it everyones embarked upon a short and exceedingly painful catwalk career. This seasons colour: orange. The Docs try their hand at lighting design. They suck at that, too. The blue nerds get ejected hard by venue security, and Lamput becomes the hit look of the show. So versatile! So changeable! One size fits all!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that theyve lost their lives purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the labs hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After the Docs constantly fail to catch Lamput with the power of science and technology, they come across an unlikely source to help them with their troubles - Magic! A witch offers them a magic marker that gives them any supernatural powers they draw on their skin. Lamput must now escape and Skinny with their new magical power!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny is being kept awake by a bad case of the hiccups. Half asleep, he guzzles down a midnight drink. Turns out Specs has forgotten sharehouse rule number one: DONT KEEP EXPERIMENTAL LAB CONCOCTIONS IN THE KITCHEN FRIDGE. Skinnys hiccups dont get better. Unless you count "literally turning into a monster every time you hiccup" as "better". No point sitting around shedding on the furniture: Specs puts his newly monsterific buddy to good use as a Lamput-hunter. Which goes well until Skinny gets better. If you count being chased off into the distance by an angry bear as "better".

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. / While salmon fishing on the riverbank Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. / With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers. / The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a bottle containing a love potion anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings clumsiness and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him. But the insect can never hold out long enough for the Lemmings to swipe the jar before being knocked out. They decide to give the fly intensive sports training.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, its a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry brings Tom to consciousness. His partner has an aluminum bat on his head, arrow in his butt, bee stings on his arm, tire treads on his back, lipstick on his cheek and a terrible case of amnesia. Jerry must help Tom use the investigative clues on his body to solve what happened. The clues will take them to some destinations that may leave Tom more physically abused than when he started but in better mental shape (as each stop causes a little more memory to return).

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty - no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors - the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesnt want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Toms ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After another successful attempt on Jerrys part to elude Tom, Jerry overhears Rick and Ginger talk about the possibility of getting rid of that "useless cat." Rick makes the case that the cat, "just takes up space, only serves one function and doesnt even do that well," and, "they should replace it with something that can get the job done!" When Ginger sounds like shes considering the possibility, Jerry cant believe his ears! Jerry imagines life in the house with a killer cat and decides to do whatever he can to make sure Tom stays. Problem is, Tom thinks Jerrys flagrant attempts to get caught are a trap. In the end, Jerry finds out Rick was talking about that ugly cat doorstop that was a wedding present from Gingers Aunt Gracie. Unfortunately, Toms had enough of Jerrys taunting and is ready to take the bait!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spikes a sore loser. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Toms finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spikes right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just cant win!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tuffy and Jerry are brushing their teeth. Tuffys so tired he uses Jerrys tail instead of his toothbrush. They climb in their respective beds, only Tuffys not in his bed, hes in the palm of Toms hand that Toms made-up to look like a bed. Tom gets walloped for his little stunt but it points out to Jerry that he needs a safer home. What begins with Jerry securing his home from Tom, turns into an arms race between the cat and mouse where they each build their own booby-trapped bunker to protect themselves from each other. They turn out to be their own greatest enemy, with the biggest threat coming from their own creations. In the end, they go back to their relatively safer existence.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a trip down memory lane when the Docs find an old childhood photo and reminisce about their first meeting so many years ago. It all started at Lab School, when Specs was a naive dork and Skinny was the school ruffian. A lot has changed since then, of course. Specs is now the tough guy, and Skinny is now the dork, and their early adventures set in motion a bunch of other consequences, too. Embittered, angry boss? Check. Moustachioed Chief of Police with an age-old grudge? Check. Also dont forget the lab experiment that went spectacularly wrong. That orange blob in the test tube: did that just move?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Doc Specs and Lamput finds themselves stranded on an island. Will they be able to get home? Or maybe they will make a new home on the island. Has Doc Specs traded Doc Skinny for Lamput as his best friend? Crazier things have happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs prove their inventing skills by coming up with an age-altering time-ray. This breakthrough could change the world. If they used it for something other than chasing Lamput. Obsessed much, fellas? Wildly shooting their time-ray off in public causes a not-unsurprising amount of chaos, until the local law enforcement gets caught in the cross-fire. Looks like the Specs and Skinny are gonna be in jail till they get old the normal way.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is caught but makes a new friend, Tuzki who comes to his rescue!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pauleen Penguin hires The Looney Builders to build an ice bowling alley in Looneyburg. F

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Prince Lionel of England hires The Looney Builders to build him a party room for his birthday, then proceeds to boss the crew around. / Our heroes set off on adventure… on a cruise ship! / Marina gives the pilot a crash course in navigation. / Zig finds a book about African wildlife and realises thats where he actually comes from. He decides to go there and meet his compatriots. / Will Deep-sea diver Barbara bring Bernie back to the surface? / While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. / The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. / The Bear is preparing to go on a world trip but a last minute accident makes him panic. / Masha is tired of music lessons and she decides she can perform without the tedious learning of notes and goes for a walk with the "Bremen Town Musicians" in fairytale Germany. / A new friend got lost in the forest. Masha acts like a real Robin Hood. She wants to help this lost soul to return home. Meanwhile, the Wolves are trying to get to our guest. / This is a very long car ride! What fun things can we look for out the window that will make the time go faster? / Tom and Jerry mistake burglars loot for a bag of donuts.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! / Bibi just cant put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bams utility belt for a mission. F 3/3

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just cant put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bams utility belt for a mission. Can she overcome the enticing distraction to save the day when Bams mis-packed belt goes haywire?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired by Dixie Wolf to find all the sheep that have gone missing.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom sits in Frankensteins lab seat, he gets transformed into a colossus with his miracle growth potion.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A guilty conscience causes Butch to change his ways. But Tom Jerry Spike and Tuffy quickly decide they like the old Butch better.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Toms assigned laundry duty at the estate and Jerrys determined to soil the job.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom finds himself trapped inside a Catsylvania bedtime story and fleeing from a furious Jabberwock.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Spike needs convinced hes still the alpha dog.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked "ollies" with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. Grizzy thinks its a silly game until he accidentally tries out the contraption for himself and becomes instantly addicted. What is the secret of this seemingly banal object that make the heads of its enthusiasts spin as well?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program. / The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. / The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. / The Lemmings play with figurines of wild Canadian animals.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of. You must feed it, put it to bed, play with it... Grizzy takes his new responsibility as a "parent" very seriously, but the Lemmings decide to complete the virtual Grizzys education with far more intense activities.

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids and Smellvelous must face a toxic cloud released by Stinkator, which turns the SuperThings into zombies at his mercy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When the Witch Sisters are brewing up their latest concoction, they discover that their stash of walnuts has disappeared. Needless to say, Jerry is enjoying the "nuts" of his labor, while Tom is sent out to gather more nuts. When Tom steals the winters supply of nuts from a feisty flying squirrel, things go from bad to worse. Not only does the squirrel take Jerrys stash, but the irate rodent launches an attack on Tom inside the house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen - only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese - including waking up Tom!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch and Meathead dont want to miss a marathon of their favourite show so they make a deal with Tom to trade a little TV time for a treasure map. Of course, Tom and Jerry dont know the map is a fake. Butch and Meathead try to get comfortable while Tom and Jerry must figure out how to circumvent Spike when they realise his house is directly on top of their riches.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, with all the strange, bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its a sleepover! Lil Quacker is going to spend the night over at Jerrys place. Jerrys working double time to keep the fearless duck safe from Tom. When Tyke wants Jerry and Lil Quacker to sleepover in the doghouse, Spike relents. A grateful Jerry drifts off to dreamland but not so fast when the sleepwalking duck goes on a nighttime adventure, Jerry and the gang have to save Lil Quacker from all the nocturnal dangers!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. Butch finds out that living Toms cushy life isnt what it seems when Jerry makes his life difficult and Gingers doting is humiliating. Tom finds that living off the street is tricky and difficult. They very quickly switch back to the way it was.
